summary: Executes shell commands or REST calls on a schedule to kick off work.

config.name: enabled
config.label: Enabled
config.description: Temporarily disable the trigger without removing it from the swarm.

config.name: intervalMs
config.label: Interval (ms)
config.description: Delay between trigger executions reported to orchestrators.

config.name: singleRequest
config.label: Single request
config.description: Run the trigger exactly once per schedule instead of streaming.

config.name: actionType
config.label: Action type
config.description: Switch between shell and REST execution modes.

config.name: command
config.label: Shell command
config.description: Command executed when the action type is shell.

config.name: method
config.label: HTTP method
config.description: Verb applied to REST trigger requests.

config.name: body
config.label: Request body
config.description: Payload forwarded for REST trigger requests.

config.name: headers
config.label: HTTP headers
config.description: Additional headers included with REST trigger requests.
